txt_en: It is good to see you smile.
txt_cn: 看到你的微笑真好。

txt_en: This world has more secrets than we can possibly imagine.
txt_cn: 这个世界还有更多的秘密超乎我们想象。

txt_en: We get to decide what our story is.
txt_cn: 书写自己的故事！

txt_en: You are in my memories. You walk among them.
txt_cn: 你永远在我的记忆里穿行，不曾忘却。

txt_en: Home is the place when you leave you just miss it.
txt_cn: 家，是你一离开就会开始想念的地方。

txt_en: Keep your mind focused on your task.
txt_cn: 专注于你要做的事。

txt_en: Let's hope tomorrow's better.
txt_cn: 希望明天会更好！

txt_en: You are the love of my life, and I am yours.
txt_cn: 你是我此生挚爱，我亦如此。

txt_en: I will always be proud of you.
txt_cn: 我将永远以你为荣。

txt_en: I will keep loving you until the end of time.
txt_cn: 我永远爱你，至死不渝。

txt_en: One regret can't change an entire life.
txt_cn: 一次遗憾无法改变整个人生。

txt_en: Remember, you are absolutely, truly amazing.
txt_cn: 记住，你真的很了不起。

txt_en: A friend is important to you.
txt_cn: 朋友是很重要的。

txt_en: Be bold and fearless.
txt_cn: 去做一个勇敢无畏的人！

txt_en: Everyone deserves love.
txt_cn: 每个人都值得被爱。

txt_en: People love humility.
txt_cn: 人们喜欢谦逊的人。

txt_en: We will build a life together.
txt_cn: 我们将一起创造人生。

txt_en: Nothing worthwhile in life comes easy.
txt_cn: 人生中值得珍惜的都来之不易。

txt_en: You are capable of great things.
txt_cn: 你有能力成就大事。

txt_en: Don't make promises you can't keep.
txt_cn: 不要许下你无法兑现的承诺。

txt_en: Being a real hero takes time and experience.
txt_cn: 成为真英雄需要时间与历练。

txt_en: My time and experiences without you are meaningless to me.
txt_cn: 没有你的时光和旅程对我来说毫无意义。

txt_en: True happiness is a lot closer than you think.
txt_cn: 真正的幸福比你想象得更触手可及。

txt_en: Take charge of your future.
txt_cn: 掌握自己的未来。

txt_en: In the darkness, there's always a crack. It's how the light gets in.
txt_cn: 在黑暗中，总会有一道裂缝，那便是光照进来的地方。

txt_en: Confidence is not something you have. It's something you create.
txt_cn: 自信不是与生俱来的，而是自己赋予的。

txt_en: I live to be the ruler of life, not a slave.
txt_cn: 我要主宰自己的生活，绝不屈服。
